text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
To: Executive Committee
From: Skomia
December 11, 1953
Herewith copies of additional applications for NAEB
Associate Director* s job, A couple look a little-
expensive for our taste, and none so far, except Fen*,
is an experienced educational broadcaster.
These, plus Bardos^ are all that have been received to
date. December Newsletter carries.announcement, and
several other people have been invited to apply.
